name: Cyberpunk 2077 3
description:
Those who fall will eventually hit the ground.

Cyberpunk 2077 3 is the sequel to Cyberpunk 2077 2: https://riks.itch.io/cyberpunk-2077-2 and a WW2 simulator from the perspective of Lois Griffin.

Made by Kris Camp.

WASD or joystick to move

A or X to jump on controller, Space on Keyboard.

Disclaimer: The jam this was entered into wants me to charge money for the game. for obvious reasons, I am not doing that. I was just bored and wanted to make a dumb game. hopefully it makes folks laugh.
